name: Flu
symptoms: Fever, Cough, Sore throat, Runny nose, Body aches
precautions: Wash hands regularly, Avoid close contact with sick people, Stay home when sick

name: Common Cold
symptoms: Sneezing, Runny nose, Cough, Sore throat
precautions: Wash hands frequently, Avoid close contact with sick individuals

name: COVID-19
symptoms: Fever, Cough, Shortness of breath, Loss of taste or smell
precautions: Wear masks, Maintain social distance, Wash hands frequently

name: Diabetes
symptoms: Increased thirst, Frequent urination, Extreme fatigue, Blurred vision
precautions: Healthy diet, Regular exercise, Monitor blood sugar levels
treatments: Insulin therapy, Oral medications, Diet management

name: Asthma
symptoms: Wheezing, Shortness of breath, Chest tightness, Coughing
precautions: Avoid triggers, Use inhalers as prescribed, Regular check-ups

name: Hypertension
precautions: Limit salt intake, Regular exercise, Avoid stress

name: Heart Disease
symptoms: Chest pain, Shortness of breath, Fatigue
precautions: Healthy diet, Regular exercise, Avoid smoking
treatments: Medications, Lifestyle changes, Surgery if necessary

name: Allergies
symptoms: Sneezing, Itchy eyes, Runny nose, Rash
precautions: Avoid allergens, Keep windows closed during pollen season

name: Pneumonia
precautions: Get vaccinated, Avoid smoking, Practice good hygiene
treatments: Antibiotics, Cough medicine, Hospital care if severe

name: Gastroenteritis
precautions: Wash hands, Avoid contaminated food and water

name: Migraine
symptoms: Severe headache, Nausea, Sensitivity to light
precautions: Identify triggers, Manage stress, Stay hydrated

name: Arthritis
precautions: Regular exercise, Healthy weight, Physical therapy

name: Osteoporosis
symptoms: Bone fractures, Loss of height, Back pain
precautions: Calcium and vitamin D intake, Weight-bearing exercises

name: Chronic Kidney Disease
precautions: Healthy diet, Stay hydrated, Regular check-ups

name: Anemia
precautions: Iron-rich diet, Regular check-ups

name: Thyroid Disorders
precautions: Regular check-ups, Healthy diet

name: Psoriasis
symptoms: Red patches of skin, Itching, Scaly skin
precautions: Avoid triggers, Moisturize regularly

name: Eczema
symptoms: Itchy skin, Red or brown patches, Dry skin
precautions: Moisturize regularly, Avoid irritants

name: Hepatitis
precautions: Avoid sharing needles, Safe sex practices

name: Tuberculosis
symptoms: Persistent cough, Chest pain, Coughing up blood
precautions: Stay away from infected individuals, Vaccination

name: Malaria
precautions: Use mosquito nets, Take antimalarial medication

name: Dengue Fever
symptoms: High fever, Severe headache, Joint pain
precautions: Use mosquito repellent, Eliminate standing water

name: Cholera
precautions: Drink clean water, Wash hands regularly

name: HIV/AIDS
precautions: Practice safe sex, Regular testing

name: Gout
precautions: Limit alcohol intake, Avoid high-purine foods

name: Acid Reflux
precautions: Eat smaller meals, Avoid trigger foods

name: Celiac Disease
precautions: Avoid gluten, Regular check-ups

name: Irritable Bowel Syndrome
precautions: Healthy diet, Regular exercise

name: Parkinson's Disease
precautions: Stay active, Regular check-ups

name: Multiple Sclerosis
precautions: Stay active, Avoid extreme temperatures

name: Alzheimer's Disease
symptoms: Memory loss, Confusion, Difficulty completing tasks
precautions: Maintain mental activity, Regular check-ups

name: Bipolar Disorder
symptoms: Mood swings, Energy changes, Sleep disturbances
precautions: Regular therapy, Healthy lifestyle

name: Depression
symptoms: Persistent sadness, Loss of interest, Fatigue
precautions: Regular exercise, Healthy diet, Seek help

name: Anxiety Disorders
precautions: Practice relaxation techniques, Seek help

name: Schizophrenia
precautions: Regular medication, Supportive environment

name: Autism Spectrum Disorder
precautions: Structured routines, Supportive environment

name: Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder
precautions: Seek therapy, Medication if needed

name: Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder
precautions: Therapy, Support networks

name: Sleep Apnea
symptoms: Loud snoring, Gasping for air, Daytime fatigue
precautions: Maintain a healthy weight, Avoid alcohol
